steps.name: Given I visit the NYB admin website and log in as a user with create, edit, and view access,
Navigating to the admin site: https://uat.nybdistributor.com:3000/
Login with 7550380274 as username and Lifo@123 as password
When I navigate to the Inventory module and verified the landing page URL,
Navigating to the inventory module > Create Inbound Inventory page
When I choose the document type as "Vendor Invoice", select warehouse, and select vendor
Vendor Invoice selected as document type

added inward quantity:
quantity1: 100,
quantity2: 80,
quantity3: 60,
quantity4: 150,
quantity5: 0,
quantity6: 20,
added damaged quantity:
damaged quantity1: 100
,damaged quantity2: 80
,damaged quantity3: 60
,damaged quantity4: 150
,damaged quantity5: 0
,damaged quantity6: 20
,
When I Enter Vendor Invoice No,

attachments.name: Entering vendor invoice no. is successfull

steps.name: When I add Document Proof For Discount,

added products:
                    Product1: BCAA 1000 Caps - Acai Berry - 60 Capsules,
                    Product2: Xtend Perfect 10 - Watermelon - 40 Servings,
                    Product3: Aminos - Brownie Chocolate Cookie Monster - Large,
                    Product4: Aminos - Blondie Birthday Confetti Cake - 11oz - 4pk,
                    Product5: Anabar - Lemon Lime - Small,
                    Product6: Legendary Protein Tasty Pastry & Pop Tarts - Cookies & Cream - 10 Count
